```py
>>> fig, ax = plt.subplots()
>>> ax.plot(x, si, label='Si(x)')
>>> ax.plot(x, ci, '--', label='Ci(x)')
>>> ax.legend(shadow=True, framealpha=1, loc='upper left')
>>> ax.set_xlabel('x')

>>> ax.axhline(np.pi/2, linestyle=':', alpha=0.5, color='k')
>>> ax.axhline(-np.pi/2, linestyle=':', alpha=0.5, color='k')
>>> ax.grid(True)
>>> plt.show()
```
